references.paper_title: Emerging properties in self-supervised vision transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces the DINO self-supervised learning method, which is used as the backbone for the proposed FlipClass model in this research.
This paper introduces the task of Generalized Category Discovery (GCD), which is the main focus of this research.

references.paper_title: Generalized category discovery with decoupled prototypical network
references.reason: This paper proposes SimGCD, a state-of-the-art GCD method which is used as a baseline for comparison in the experiments.

references.paper_title: Mean teachers are better role models: Weight-averaged consistency targets improve semi-supervised deep learning results
references.reason: This paper introduces the Mean Teacher model, which is a commonly used teacher-student model in semi-supervised learning and is relevant to the teacher-student framework used in this research.

references.paper_title: Pseudo-label: The simple and efficient semi-supervised learning method for deep neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of pseudo-labeling, a technique used in semi-supervised learning and relevant to the GCD task.
